body_content.explanation: the fact of working hard or giving your attention to a particular thing:
examples: Some of us can handle more busyness and activity than others.
I’m exhausted from the intense busyness of work over the past couple of months.

body_content.explanation: the state of a place that is full of activity or people:
examples: Some people like the busyness of fashionable yacht harbours.
It is hard to imagine the busyness inside one of our cells.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which there are many things to do:
examples: The busyness of the time leading up to the wedding had wiped me out.
Modern life has introduced incredible busyness.
